title: This Bollywood Couple Is Holidaying In Mauritius And Their Photos Are Breathtaking | MissMalini
text:
Swagata Dam Feb . 23 . 2017 
Bollywood and TV hottie Ruslaan Mumtaz often heads to various gorgeous destinations with his wifey Nirali Mehta . After dating each other for quite sometime, these cuties tied the knot and have been living happily ever after . Scroll through their Instagram profiles and youâ€™d see that their life looks like is a big fun party. The duo is enjoying their marital bliss and how! Currently, they are chilling in Mauritius and posting some breathtaking pictures of their romantic vacay. Check these out.
